item.description:
Short notice, but trivia is back in session.

The old go-to midweek trivia classic is back for another year. There should be a shakeup in the beer selection (winter ale maybe?) besides the always dependable nachos.

Come on down, beat the midweek blues as we make another showing.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

Game starts close to 8:30 and runs for about 2 hours!

See you there.


**** Try to get down there around 8:15 so that we can get good tables.

Any winnings will be applied to a future event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Trivia @Union Station
